content: put a smile on your little buddy s face with this crochet hat for boys of course you can make this beanie for anyone and everyone but i wanted to create something a little on the boyish side for my twins who turned seven this month the buddy beanie is worked from the bottom up and the main stitch is the easy but interesting herringbone half_double_crochet a chart photos and detailed instructions are included for the colorwork portion of this crochet hat no pom pom maker no problem i ve also included step-by-step instructions and a photo tutorial for dyi pom poms this pattern is written for child size 4-10 years but general instructions are given for adapting to sizes from toddler to adult note exact stitch counts are not given for each size a quick print no photos version of this pattern is included at the end of the pdf if you prefer to print without photos visit www knottednest com for the free version of this pattern pattern download - please note this listing is for the pattern only - pattern is written in us terms - pattern includes written instructions a colorwork chart and step-by-step pictures skill level intermediate - colorwork and decreasing are involved as well as working into the side of ribbing sizing this pattern is written for a child size 4-10 years but general instructions are given for adapting the buddy beanie to different sizes the hat pictured child size is approximately 19 in circumference and 8 tall without pom pom share your work tag me on instagram @theknottednest and use the #thebuddybeanie hashtag to show off your new project copyright the buddy beanie pattern and photographs are property of the knotted nest and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not alter share or sell this pattern in any way however you are welcome to sell the finished product that you make using this pattern please credit the knotted nest by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online
